message.content:
cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.AI, cs.SI, cs.DS

This paper is about using reinforcement learning for optimizing policies of recommender systems. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.LG (Machine Learning), which is the primary focus of the paper. The paper also deals with information retrieval (cs.IR) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI) since recommender systems are a subfield of these areas. Additionally, the paper discusses the use of generative adversarial networks (GANs) for modeling user-agent interaction, which falls under the category of social and information networks (cs.SI). Finally, the paper deals with data analysis and machine learning (cs.DS) since it proposes a new solution for offline policy learning.
